Realtime Dividend Tokens
May 11th, 2018
You may already be aware that some dApps do entitle you to receive dividends. However, there are a few problems: tokens cannot be transferred during the distribution period, and if you don't claim your dividend it is forfeited. Fortunately, there's a much easier way to manage dividends, both for the user and for the developer: through the Token itself, in realtime.

May 11th, 2018
We're tremendously excited to announce that PennyEther is live on MainNet and taking bets! You can view the details of all deployed contracts (source code, tests, etherscan verification, etc), as well as the realtime status of all contracts.
